body_html: @guschmue Do you think the project would ever consider explicitly exposing just the public API for all platforms? Would it be fair to say this is currently implicit based on the doc generation process? Looks like GCC 4 supports something similar to __declspec(dllexport) - http://gcc.gnu.org/wiki/Visibility. Although, the caveats on that page regarding exceptions sound messy, so perhaps this has already been discussed and decided against...
